column4: hi. i had a fresh install and everything was running fine until i installed firestarter via applications add. immedietalye lost view of NAS on the smb.. however i was abel to access it directly via the IP. i removed firestarter, but this did not undo the damage,. why did this happen and what can i do?
iptables -P INPUT ACCEPT ; iptables -P OUTPUT ACCEPT ; iptables -P FORWARD ACCEPT ; iptables -F
that should remove what firestarter added.
